description: The superhero with a suit and a cape standing on a monster's head.
text:
Superhero: Here I go again.
character: Superhero

description: A monster with big claws, multiple eyes, and sharp fangs reaching toward the city.
The superhero with a suit and a cape defeating the monster.
The superhero with a suit and a cape smiling towards the citizens in the city.
The superhero with a suit and a cape waving towards the citizens in the city, while holding the monster's head.
